title: How to Register for an Epic Games Account

steps.title: Go to the Epic Games website:
steps.content: Go to the Epic Games website: epicgames.com

steps.title: Click the sign in button.
steps.content: Click the sign in button. You will find this in the upper right hand corner. Click it.

steps.title: Click the link that says "Sign Up".
steps.content: Click the link that says "Sign Up". This is at the bottom. If you don't already have an account, click this link.

steps.title: Select the way you would like to sign up.
steps.content: Select the way you would like to sign up. There are currently seven different ways you can sign up, including using your email, Facebook, a gaming console account, Google, or Apple account.

steps.title: Enter your date of birth.
steps.content: Enter your date of birth. You must be 13 or older to create an account.

steps.title: Fill out the required information.
steps.content: Fill out the required information. It will ask you for your name, a display name and a password. You will also need to agree to the terms of service and then press "Continue".

steps.title: Check your email for the verification link Epic Games sent you.
steps.content: Check your email for the verification link Epic Games sent you. You now have an Epic Games account.
